home.name: Hello, my name is Ivan
home.from: From Tandil, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.text-p1: I am a 24-year-old developer, recently graduated in the Technical Degree in Software Development (TUDAI) from the Faculty of Exact Sciences at the National University of the Center of Buenos Aires Province, Tandil, in November 2023. My academic background has provided me with a solid foundation in modern technologies and agile methodologies, allowing me to adapt easily to the challenges of software development.
about.text-p2: During my internship at the Center for Innovation and Creation of Enterprises (CICE) from December 2023 to February 2024, I had the opportunity to design and develop a web platform for project and entrepreneur management. I worked on both back-end with Spring Boot and MySQL, and front-end using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project, managed using Scrum methodology, allowed me to gain practical experience and better understand team dynamics.
about.text-p3: Although I do not yet have formal work experience, I am highly motivated to continue learning and growing in my career. I am comfortable working in both front-end and back-end roles, and I am eager to contribute to challenging projects where I can apply my skills and continue my professional development. Additionally, I am available full-time to join new teams and contribute to their success.
